content: प्रकृष् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To draw away, pull, attract. {@--2@} To lead (as an army). {@--3@} To bend (as a bow). {@--4@} To increase. {@--5@} To draw or stretch out, prolong. {@--6@} To place before or in front. {@--7@} To harass, disturb, afflict' trouble. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} To be enhanced or increased; <ls>U. 7. 8.</ls>
